column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Danielle - Thank you very much for the great review. I'm glad you were able to miss the dinner rush -- you're right
column2: things pick up around 7:30PM-8:30PM and sometimes don't let up until well past 10PM. In the coming months we plan to open two more locations
column3: which hopefully will mitigate these wait times
column5: we do our best to keep the tables turning without rushing anyone along. Thank you again
column6: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
